examples: She wrote an article for the newspaper.
I need to read that article again to fully understand it.
Ela escreveu um artigo para o jornal.
Preciso ler esse artigo novamente para entender completamente.

suggested: A well-researched article on the benefits of meditation.
A controversial article on the merits of veganism.
An article explaining the basics of quantum mechanics.
A compelling article arguing for the importance of mental health days.
A humorous article poking fun at the quirks of modern dating.
An article exploring the psychological benefits of practicing gratitude.
An article challenging common assumptions about the role of technology in our lives.
